mapper.update: UPDATE leave_list SET remarks="已审核" WHERE parents_confirm="已审核" AND teacher_approve="已审核"
UPDATE leave_list SET remarks="未通过" WHERE parents_confirm="未通过" OR teacher_approve="未通过"
mapper.select: SELECT l.id,s.student_name,c.class_grade_name,l.leave_type,l.start_time,l.end_time,l.reason,l.teacher_approve,l.parents_confirm,l.sponsor,l.launch_time,l.remarks FROM leave_list l,student s,class_grade c WHERE l.student_id=s.student_id AND s.class_id=c.class_id AND l.is_deleted=1

SELECT l.id,s.student_name,c.class_grade_name,l.leave_type,l.start_time,l.end_time,l.reason,l.teacher_approve,l.parents_confirm,l.sponsor,l.launch_time,l.remarks,u.user_name FROM leave_list l,student s,class_grade c WHERE l.student_id=s.student_id AND s.class_id=c.class_id AND l.is_deleted=1
AND l.id=#{id}

SELECT t.user_id,s.student_id,student_name FROM teacher t, teacher_class tc, student s WHERE t.teacher_jobno = tc.teacher_jobno AND s.class_id = tc.class_id
AND t.user_id=#{user_id}

SELECT l.id,s.student_name,c.class_grade_name,l.leave_type,l.start_time,l.end_time,l.reason,l.teacher_approve,l.parents_confirm,l.sponsor,l.launch_time,l.remarks FROM leave_list l,student_parent sp,student s,class_grade c WHERE l.student_id=sp.student_id AND l.student_id=s.student_id AND s.class_id=c.class_id AND l.is_deleted=1
